name: Hanspur's Flotsam Vessel
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: People of the River © 2014, Paizo Inc.
components: V, S, M (driftwood branch or river rat's tail)
effect: raft large enough for caster and one passenger/2 levels
text: This spell assembles a sturdy raft and oars from driftwood, reeds, and other river detritus. The smallest raft created by the spell is roughly 5 feet square, increasing by an additional 5 feet square for every 2 caster levels you possess. Each 5-foot section of the raft can carry two Medium passengers or 300 pounds of cargo. The vessel functions as a normal raft, except it is not slowed or damaged by non-magical river hazards such as rapids or shallows, and it is always considered to be traveling downstream for the purpose of calculating travel speed, regardless of its actual direction.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料 (漂流木的树枝或河鼠的尾巴)
effect_zh: 能装下施法者与1名乘客/2等级，足够大的木筏
text_zh: 此法术从漂流木、芦苇与其他河流废弃物组装一搜木筏与划桨。由此法术创造出来的小小的木筏大约有5平方呎，你每有2个施法者等级额外增加5平方呎。木筏上每5呎区域可以携带两名中体型乘客或300磅的货物。这艘小船就像一般的木筏，除了它不会被非魔法的河流威胁(hazards)，像是急流或浅滩所减速或伤害，并且，在计算行驶速度时，它被认为是在向下游航行，而非它目前真实的航行方向。
